member.name: T:Sudoku.Recording.RecordableItem
member.summary: Defines a recordable item. This type is used for recording a user's behavior on finishing a sudoku puzzle.

member.name: F:Sudoku.Recording.RecordableItem._mask
member.summary: Indicates the inner mask.
member.remarks:
This field only uses 11 bits. The lower 10 bits to describe the candidate the user operates, and the 11th bit from lower means which kind of behavior that a user want to operate that candidate (set or delete). Other bits is reserved for later use. The sketch is like:
16 1110 0 |xxxx|| | |-------|-------| 16 8 0

member.name: M:Sudoku.Recording.RecordableItem.#ctor(Sudoku.Recording.RecordableItemType,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a instance via the specified recordable type and candidate used.
member.param: The recordable type. Indicates which kind of behavior that user want to operate that candidate.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Recording.RecordableItem.#ctor(Sudoku.Recording.RecordableItemType,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a instance via the specified recordable type, cell and digit used.
member.param: The recordable type. Indicates which kind of behavior that user want to operate that candidate.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Recording.RecordableItem.#ctor(System.Int16)
member.summary: Initializes a instance via the mask.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Recording.RecordableItem.Type
member.summary: Indicates the type of the recording item.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Recording.RecordableItem.Cell
member.summary: Indicates the cell used.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Recording.RecordableItem.Digit
member.summary: Indicates the digit used.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Recording.RecordableItem.Candidate
member.summary: Indicates the candidate used. The property value is equivalent to expression * 9 + .

member.name: P:Sudoku.Recording.RecordableItem.Timestamp
member.summary: Indicates the current timestamp.

member.name: T:Sudoku.Recording.RecordableItemCollection
member.summary: Defines a collection of s.

member.name: F:Sudoku.Recording.RecordableItemCollection._recordables
member.summary: Indicates the inner collection.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Recording.RecordableItemCollection.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Sudoku.Recording.RecordableItem},Sudoku.Concepts.Grid@,System.Int64)
member.summary: Initializes a instance via the specified collection of instances.
member.param: Indicates the timestamp that starts the stopwatch to record steps.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Recording.RecordableItemCollection.Count
member.summary: Indicates the number of steps that the current collection being stored.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Recording.RecordableItemCollection.StartTimestamp
member.summary: Indicates the start timestamp. This value records the time information that is ahead of the first step recorded.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Recording.RecordableItemCollection.ElapsedTime
member.summary: Indicates the total elapsed time that starts the and ends with the final step's timestamp.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Recording.RecordableItemCollection.Grid
member.summary: Indicates the current grid used.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Recording.RecordableItemCollection.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a read-only reference to the element at the specified in the read-only collection.
member.returns: A read-only reference to the element at the specified in the read-only collection.

member.name: T:Sudoku.Recording.RecordableItemType
member.summary: Indicates what kind of recordable item it is.

member.name: F:Sudoku.Recording.RecordableItemType.SetDigit
member.summary: Indicates the recordable item is to set a digit into a cell.

member.name: F:Sudoku.Recording.RecordableItemType.DeleteDigit
member.summary: Indicates the recordable item is to delete a digit from a cell.
